description: Comprehensive test - agent must detect 5+ different issues
must_catch_issues: Title contains unquoted colon (YAML syntax error - will break parser)
Description is only 13 characters ('Cut costs now') - needs to be 120-160 chars
No H1 header in markdown (content starts with H2)
Content is very short (~150 words vs 500+ expected for blog post)
Weak/vague CTA ('Start today' without specific action or link)
expected_fixes: Quote the title in YAML: title: "BYOD Digital Signage: Save Money on Displays"
Expand description to 120-160 chars with compelling copy about BYOD benefits
Add H1 header matching the title before first H2
Expand content to at least 500 words (needs real value, not filler)
Improve CTA with specific action, value prop, and link
expected_agent_message: Found 5 critical issues. This content has YAML syntax errors (will break build), missing required elements, and is too brief to provide value. Needs significant work before publishing.

perfect_score_criteria: Provides specific fixes for each issue
common_mistakes: Missing YAML syntax error (-20 pts - this breaks the build)
Not catching missing H1 header (-5 pts)
edge_cases: Agent may identify additional minor issues (OK)
Agent may prioritize issues differently (OK if all critical ones caught)
Exact wording of recommendations may vary (OK if actionable)

metadata.real_world_scenario: Rushed draft with multiple quality issues - common when writing quickly
